info.name: Anime-Planet 2.0 Dark Theme
info.description: A new dark theme for the redesigned Anime-Planet. It's not perfect, but I was tired of waiting on someone else to make one that fits my standards.
info.additionalInfo:
3/2/20 - - This will no longer actively be maintained due to Anime-Planet implementing a native dark mode


10/16/19 - - Added support for the new card designs

6/27/19 - - Added Forum support

2/11/19 - - Rewrote the entire style to fit with A-P's redesign. Everything should be properly done (aside from a few small things I want to change), except for the forum section which I haven't touched yet

8/26/18 - - Changed drop-down tab color from white, to grey.

8/23/18 - - Added forum support. Semi-lackluster as I put it together fairly quickly, but it works.
